title: A quantum breakthrough: Seizing the AI advantage
description: Backed by business advisory and funding support, companies in Singapore are increasingly turning to artificial intelligence to streamline operations and boost efficiency.
content:
Across different sectors, Singapore businesses are finding that the right use of artificial intelligence (AI) can transform time-consuming processes into faster, more accurate and more cost-effective operations.

title: Starmer’s AI push at risk from public scepticism, think tank warns
description: Nearly twice as many people see artificial intelligence (AI) as a risk to the economy rather than an opportunity — a scepticism that could undermine Sir Keir Starmer’s bid to make AI central to the Government’s growth strategy, Sir Tony Blair’s think tank has warned.
content:
Polling from the Tony Blair Institute (TBI) and Ipsos found that 39% of Britons see AI as a threat and 20% as an opportunity.
It comes after the Prime Minister signed a new tech deal with Donald Trump last week as he seeks to make Britain a world lea... [2424 chars]

title: The Human Edge in an AI World
description: Artificial intelligence may be rewriting workplace rules, but humans still hold the advantage if they embrace the right skills
content: By far, the biggest concern around AI is how it might impact jobs. “Is my job safe?” and “Will my children find jobs in the age of AI?” are common refrains today. This is not surprising, since AI is a cognitive technology, perhaps the first tool we h... [6573 chars]

title: British firms ‘falling behind global rivals’ in adopting AI
description: Matt Clifford, who wrote the UK’s artificial intelligence action plan, warns of a dangerous complacency
content:

title: Is artificial intelligence overhyped or is AI the 'fourth industrial revolution'?
description: It's estimated 30,000 people are working in the AI industry in Australia, and fanfare is growing with start-ups tapping into billions of dollars of venture capital. Yet there are concerns about hype and a lack of regulation.
content:
Artificial intelligence has prompted a supercharged tech boom, with valuations of the world's biggest companies soaring on the Nasdaq amid talk about a new era of human-like algorithms.

title: The first AI government minister
description: When Albanian Prime Minister Edi Rama this month announced his new Cabinet, it was not his choice of finance minister or foreign minister that gained the most attention.
